title: Fat Joe and Dre Interview and More
itunes:title: Fat Joe and Dre Interview and More
description:
Thursday 1/25- Today on the show we had Fat Joe and producer Dre from Cool and Dre stop by and spoke about Fat Joe acting skills, Cool and Dre legacy, trying to squash 50 Cent and Ja Rule beef and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a man who worked at Burger King because he wanted more hours and how he asked for more hours was with a pistol and machete. Moreover, Angela helped some listeners our during "Ask Yee".

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
